item.title: Weekly YouTube and Substack Analytics Reports
item.description:
Weekly YouTube and Substack Analytics Reports

Get a weekly performance digest for your creator channels -- subscriber growth, top-performing content, engagement trends, and actionable suggestions -- delivered straight to Telegram.

item.title: Voice Note to Journal Transcription
item.description:
Voice Note to Journal Transcription

Send a voice memo to WhatsApp or Telegram and OpenClaw transcribes it, cleans it up, extracts action items, and saves a structured journal entry to Notion.

item.title: Self-Healing Server Monitor
item.description:
Self-Healing Server Monitor

An OpenClaw agent that checks your servers, diagnoses common failures, applies known fixes automatically, and escalates to you only when it can't resolve the issue itself.

item.title: Competitor Price Monitoring
item.description:
Competitor Price Monitoring

Track competitor pricing across e-commerce sites and get instant alerts when prices change -- so you can adjust your own pricing before customers notice.

item.title: Email Inbox Triage with Smart Sorting
item.description:
Email Inbox Triage with Smart Sorting

Let OpenClaw read your inbox, sort messages by urgency, draft replies to routine emails, and auto-unsubscribe from newsletters you never open.

item.title: Automated Morning Briefing
item.description:
Automated Morning Briefing

A daily 7 AM message combining weather, calendar, priority tasks, and curated news -- delivered to WhatsApp or Telegram before you even get out of bed.

item.title: Invoice Monitor That Learns Customer Patterns
item.description:
Invoice Monitor That Learns Customer Patterns

An OpenClaw agent monitors overdue invoices on a schedule, remembers how each customer typically responds, and adapts its follow-up tone and timing accordingly -- turning collections into a persistent, intelligent process.

item.title: PDF Contract Parser with Renewal Tracking
item.description:
PDF Contract Parser with Renewal Tracking

Feed vendor contracts to OpenClaw and it extracts key terms, SLA obligations, renewal dates, and pushes reminders to your project management tool -- so you never miss a deadline.

item.title: Content Research and Publishing Pipeline
item.description:
Content Research and Publishing Pipeline

OpenClaw monitors trending topics in your niche, researches sources, drafts articles, and queues them in your CMS -- with a human-approval gate before anything goes live.

item.title: Daily Revenue Reports from Stripe
item.description:
Daily Revenue Reports from Stripe

Get a formatted revenue summary delivered to Slack or Telegram every morning -- pulling data from Stripe, Google Analytics, and your CRM automatically.

item.title: Weekly Meal Planner with Notion Integration
item.description:
Weekly Meal Planner with Notion Integration

OpenClaw generates a full weekly meal plan in Notion, complete with shopping lists sorted by store aisle, weather-aware grilling suggestions, and recipe cataloguing. Saves about an hour per week.

item.title: CI/CD Pipeline Monitor with GitHub Integration
item.description:
CI/CD Pipeline Monitor with GitHub Integration

OpenClaw watches your GitHub repos, alerts on failed builds, creates issues for flaky tests, and can even open fix PRs -- all reported to Slack in real time.

item.title: Reddit Digest Bot on Telegram
item.description:
Reddit Digest Bot on Telegram

Wake up to a Telegram message with the top posts from your favorite subreddits, filtered to topics you actually care about. Zero skills needed -- just a prompt and a cron job.

item.title: Smart Home Control via Messaging
item.description:
Smart Home Control via Messaging

Text "movie mode" to your OpenClaw agent and it dims the lights, closes the blinds, turns on the TV, and sets the thermostat -- all through Home Assistant integration.

item.title: Calendar Management via Chat
item.description:
Calendar Management via Chat

Send a WhatsApp or Telegram message like "Schedule lunch with Sarah Thursday at noon" and OpenClaw creates the Google Calendar event, sends the invite, and warns you about conflicts -- all without opening an app.
